trans-unit.target: Nab'il tib'aj ttenb'il b'inchil u'jb'il b'ananmaj te txolq'ij

trans-unit.source: Using this template, you can make an A5-size 12 month calendar, with a picture and quotation on the top page, and days on the bottom. The calendar will use the names of months and days in your language.
trans-unit.target: Tu'n txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj lu', b'a'n tu'n tkub' b'inchet jun txolq'ij te 12 xjaw, twa'l A5, tuk'il jun tilb'ilal ex jun txolyol ch'in tib'aj plaj te jawni te ju'njun t-xaq ex qe q'ij te xjaw tuj plaj te kub'ni. Qajb'ela tuj txolq'ij qe b'ib'aj xjaw ex qe q'ij tuj tyolb'ila.
Alchaqkyeqe nchi maqan ti'j aq'unb'il lu'

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot make a "shell" for other languages to use.
trans-unit.target: Ja'lo, mib'ax kub' b'inchet jun "txolq'ij b'incha'nmaj" tu'n tajb'en kyuj qe juntl yol.

trans-unit.source: Thanks to Bruce Cox (SIL Cameroon) for getting this template started.
trans-unit.target: Chjonte te Bruce Cox (SIL Camer√∫n) tu'n ma t-xi' qe' txolb'ab'il aq'untl b'incha'nmaj lu'.
